languages.text: При развитии корабля можно улучшать его очередность специальными умениями и опережать врагов в очереди хода.
As you improve your ship's capabilities, you will be able to increase its priority by selecting certain features, allowing you to act before your enemies do.
languages.original_text: При развитии корабля можно улучшать его очередность специальными умениями и опережать врагов в очереди хода.

traits.locale_text: As you improve your ship's capabilities, you will be able to increase its initiative by selecting certain features so that you can act before your enemies do.
As you improve your ship's capabilities, you will be able to increase its initiative by selecting certain features so that you can act before your enemies do.
As you improve your ship's capabilities, you will be able to increase its initiative by selecting certain features, allowing you to act before your enemies do.
As you improve your ship's capabilities, you will be able to increase its initiative by selecting certain features, allowing you to act before your enemies do.
As you improve your ship's capabilities, you will be able to increase its priority by selecting certain features, allowing you to act before your enemies do.

languages.text: Wenn du die Leistung deines Schiffs verbesserst, kannst du seine Priorität erhöhen, indem du bestimmte Eigenschaften auswählst. Dadurch kannst du vor deinen Feinden handeln.
languages.original_text: As you improve your ship's capabilities, you will be able to increase its priority by selecting certain features, allowing you to act before your enemies do.

traits.locale_text: Wenn du die Leistung deines Schiffs verbesserst, kannst du seine Initiative erhöhen, indem du bestimmte Eigenschaften auswählst. Dadurch kannst du vor deinen Feinden handeln.

languages.text: Au fur et à mesure que vous améliorez les capacités de votre vaisseau, vous pourrez augmenter sa priorité en sélectionnant certaines caractéristiques, ce qui vous permettra d'agir avant vos ennemis.
languages.original_text: As you improve your ship's capabilities, you will be able to increase its priority by selecting certain features, allowing you to act before your enemies do.

traits.locale_text: Au fur et à mesure que vous améliorez les capacités de votre vaisseau, vous pourrez augmenter son initiative en sélectionnant certaines caractéristiques, ce qui vous permettra d'agir avant vos ennemis.

languages.text: 在提升战舰性能同时，您还可以通过选择某些特殊特性，提高战舰的先攻值，让您的战舰可以抢在敌人之前采取行动。
languages.original_text: As you improve your ship's capabilities, you will be able to increase its priority by selecting certain features, allowing you to act before your enemies do.

traits.locale_text: 在提升战舰性能同时，您还可以通过选择某些特殊特性，提高战舰的先攻值，让您的战舰可以抢在敌人之前采取行动。

languages.text: Según mejores las tu nave, podrás aumentar su prioridad seleccionando ciertas características que te permitirán actuar antes que tus enemigos.
languages.original_text: As you improve your ship's capabilities, you will be able to increase its priority by selecting certain features, allowing you to act before your enemies do.

traits.locale_text: Según mejores las posibilidades de tu nave, podrás aumentar sus dotes ofensivas seleccionando ciertas características que te permitirán responder antes que tus enemigos.

languages.original_text: As you develop your ship, you can improve its initiative with special skills and get ahead of your enemies in initiative.

languages.text: 船の能力を高める時、特定の特徴を選ぶことにより、船の優先度を高めることができ、敵よりも先に行動を起こすことができるようになる。
languages.original_text: As you improve your ship's capabilities, you will be able to increase its priority by selecting certain features, allowing you to act before your enemies do.

traits.locale_text: 船の能力が高まると、特定の特徴を選ぶことによって船のイニシアチブを高めることができる。これにより、敵よりも先に行動を起こすことができるようになる。

languages.text: Gemini geliştirdikçe, düşmanlarından erken davranmanı sağlayan belirli özellikleri seçerek geminin önceliğini de artırabilirsin.
languages.original_text: As you improve your ship's capabilities, you will be able to increase its priority by selecting certain features, allowing you to act before your enemies do.
